mapper.select: SELECT a.id,u.name AS owner,a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,a.cost ,a.description,a.createTime,(SELECT name from tbl_user where id=a.createBy) AS createBy ,a.editTime,(SELECT name from tbl_user where id=a.editBy) AS editBy FROM tbl_activity a LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON a.owner=u.id WHERE a.id=#{id}
